considerations: The AuthController.cs build error is NOT part of the LLM service implementation but MUST be fixed for the overall build to succeed
The IAuthenticationService ambiguity is between ProgressPath.Services.IAuthenticationService and Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.IAuthenticationService

All LLM service files (ILLMService.cs, LLMService.cs, LLMSettings.cs, PromptTemplates.cs, GoalInterpretation.cs, ChatContext.cs, ChatResponse.cs) are already fully implemented and syntactically correct
The ProcessStudentMessageAsync signature with (ChatContext context, string studentMessage) is appropriate - the studentMessage parameter is needed to send the new message to the LLM
The fix is simple: use the fully qualified type name ProgressPath.Services.IAuthenticationService in AuthController.cs to resolve the ambiguity

steps.description: Fix the ambiguous reference error by changing the field type from 'IAuthenticationService' to the fully qualified type 'ProgressPath.Services.IAuthenticationService' on line 17 where the _authService field is declared
Fix the constructor parameter type from 'IAuthenticationService' to 'ProgressPath.Services.IAuthenticationService' on line 21 where authService parameter is declared
